alert.note: Alert for Nuckolls; Thayer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 1:17AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Jewell, southern Nuckolls and southwestern Thayer Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 116 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bostwick, or 34 miles northwest of Belleville, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Superior around 130 AM CDT. Webber around 135 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Hardy and Byron. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
